nav.ticketReady: Your ticket is ready. Have a safe journey!

about.teamDescription: making train travel smoother and more organized. Our name comes from Maat, the ancient Egyptian concept of balance, order, and harmony.
about.existDescription1: Train travel can be challenging: passengers often crowd near certain doors, creating congestion, delays, and boarding difficulties—especially for the elderly, women, and students.
about.existDescription2: Our mission is to create a smoother and more human-centered experience for every traveler.
about.solutionDescription: Ma’at is a smart, human-centered system installed inside trains. Using sensors and real-time monitoring, our system tracks passenger movement and integrates with a mobile app and web platform.
about.benefit1: See which carriages and doors are less crowded
about.benefit3: Enjoy a calmer, more organized journey
about.goal1Desc: Minimize crowding at train doors for faster boarding.
about.goal2Desc: Make entering trains smooth and comfortable for everyone.
about.goal3Desc: Reduce train dwell times at stations efficiently.
about.goal4Desc: Provide a more peaceful and organized journey.

footer.description: Your ultimate companion for smooth and organized rail travel.
footer.trendingRoutes: Most Trending Rail routes in Egypt
footer.trendingDescription: The most exceptional travel experiences that captivated travelers' hearts.
footer.promoTitle: Get promo for a cheaper price
footer.travelBeyondDesc: Discover Egypt’s hidden gems with comfort and style.
footer.routesToExploreDesc: Train routes connecting major Egyptian cities
footer.journeyDesc: Experience unforgettable trips across Egypt with our curated train routes and cozy stays.
footer.footerDescription: Our mission is to provide modern travelers with safe, comfortable, and seamless train journeys across Egypt, making every trip memorable.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you!
contact.contactDescription: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have a question, feedback, or a business inquiry, our team is ready to help.

auth.welcomeSubtitle: We help organize your train boarding smoothly and efficiently. Enjoy a comfortable and well-organized journey.
